body: It seems that AI regenerate it's creatures whenever possible, even if it's not needed and there are no threats.
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Odd AI: regenerate creatures when not needed
content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 23, 2013 02:02:57_

It seems that AI regenerate it's creatures whenever possible, even if it's not needed and there are no threats.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=394_
